name: Color Beat (Fyolk)
description:
This game was made for My First Game Jam

Color Beat is a colorful game where you'll need to think fast and wisely!

You must shoot the right colors to destruct the blocks. Keep changing colors to destroy the blocks!

Each block has a certain amount of power you must overcome in order to destroy it! Shoot with the wrong color and the block gets stronger!

Each level becomes harder to push forward

How many blocks can you destroy?
